This is the course website for SOCIOL 880: Data Visualization (Spring 2020). This is a graduate mini-seminar (i.e. a half-semester course), and the companion to the [Data Management](https://datamgmt.org) mini taught in the second half of the semester. It teaches you how to effectively visualize social science data using R and ggplot2. Learn more by reading [the syllabus](syllabus/).
